name: DiagnoserCog
short: This is a repo for a `diagnoser` cog that contains a `diagnoseissues` command that should eventually become a part of Core Red.
description: This is a repo for a `diagnoser` cog which tries to diagnose command check issues that prevent users from running commands.
install_msg: Hi there! To get started, run `[p]cog install <repo_name> diagnoser` and load the cog with `[p]load diagnoser`
author: jack1142 (Jackenmen#6607)
